title: Simulation-Driven Railway Delay Prediction: An Imitation Learning Approach
summary: Reliable prediction of train delays is essential for enhancing the robustness and efficiency of railway transportation systems. In this work, we reframe delay forecasting as a stochastic simulation task, modeling state-transition dynamics through imitation learning.
